nodes.text: Pillik was a young male Omwati who was taken by the Empire to be trained (along with several other young Omwati children, including Qwi Xux) to build superweapons for the Empire. During a test, he had a seizure and was removed by stormtroopers, screaming that he wanted to finish the test. Due to his failure, his home city was destroyed by the Empire and he was executed.
